title: <翻译>合成<Crafting><Unturned>
author: a2455564728
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a2455564728 于 2014-7-16 17:00 编辑 

中文WIKI地址：http://zh.unturned-bunker.wikia.com/wiki/Unturned_Bunker_Wiki英文WIKI地址：http://unturned-bunker.wikia.com/wiki/Unturned_Bunker_Wiki中文WIKI此页面地址：http://zh.unturned-bunker.wikia.com/wiki/合成配方英文WIKI此页面地址：http://unturned-bunker.wikia.com/wiki/Crafting_Recipes中文 Unturned Wiki已创建！虽然目前除了主页一个条目都没有，不过我相信按照目前火爆的人气，很快就会有一两条出现。

建议从英语版翻译，或者也可以自行撰写条目。

此Wiki在Unturned主界面右下角被称为“社区Wiki”。英语目前拥有400多个条目
@a20001017 
欢迎各位参与到中文WIKI的翻译中介绍Crafting is an essential part to survival within Unturned 2. This list below provides all known crafting recipes currently in the game. This page can currently only be edited by trusted users due to deletions and griefing. If there is an incorrect recipe or something that we missed, please leave a constructive and accurate comment. The team is very busy working on the wikia, and we will update it as soon as possible.

If you have trouble finding a recipe, press Ctrl+F (find) and then type in the item you are looking for. Do not ask for it in the comments.
想要在未变异者中生存下来，合成是最重要的部分。以下的列表向您提供了目前游戏中所有已知的合成配方。为防止页面缺失或者被破坏，目前只有可以信任的用户才可以编辑这个页面。如果有配方错误或者缺失的，请你留下些有意义且准确的评论。团队正在忙碌的在Wikia上工作  ，我们会尽快更新它  。
如果你很难找到你想要的配方，可以按下Ctrl+F 再输入你需要查找的配方。不要在评论中询问这个
在游戏中访问这些合成配方On the main menu of the game, there is also a button in the lower right hand corner that says "Community Wiki". When in game, simply press the Shift + Tab keys at the same time to open it! You could also grab some paper and a pencil to write down some important recipes.

Some recipes require leveling up the craftsman skill.
在游戏主菜单的右下角有一个“维基社区”的按钮。在游戏中你可以通过同时按下Shift + Tab打开它。当然，你也可以拿纸和笔记下其中的一些重要的配方。
一些合成配方需要升级的工匠等级日用品
1 Log creates 4 Board.1原木 = 4木板1 Board using Handsaw creates 4 Stick.1木板 = 4木棒1 Scrap Metal creates 2 Nails.1废金属 = 2钉子1 Scrap Metal over a fire creates 2 Bolts.1废金属 + (火) = 2螺栓2 Stick using Pocketknife creates 1 Wooden Spike.2木棒 + (小刀) = 1木穗1 Branch creates 3 Stick.1树枝 = 3木棒1 Rocks creates 3 Stone.1岩石 = 3石头2 Stone over a fire creates 1 Scrap Metal.2石头 + (火) = 1废金属1 Animal Pants creates 1 Animal Pelt.1动物毛皮裤子 = 1动物毛皮1 Animal Pelt + 1 Can creates 2 Duct Tape.1动物毛皮 + 1废罐头 = 2牛皮胶带1 Cloth using Handsaw creates 3 Rope.1布 + (手持电锯) = 3绳子1 Scrap Metal using Handsaw creates 3 Wire.1废金属 + (手持电锯) = 3线
零件
2 boards create 1 Wooden Plate.2木板 = 1木制板2 Stick create 1 Wooden Support.2木棒 = 1木支架2 Wooden Plate create 1 Wooden Frame.2木制板 = 1木框架2 Wooden Support create 1 Wooden Cross.2木支架 = 1木十字2 Stone create 1 Stone Plate.2石头 = 1石制板1 Stone with 1 Board creates 1 Stone Support.2石头 + 1木板 = 1石支架2 Stone Plates create 1 Stone Frame.2石制板 = 1石框架2 Stone Supports create 1 Stone Cross.2石支架 = 1石十字
路障和陷阱
3 Board with 1 Nails creates 1 Wooden Shield.3木棒 + 1钉子 = 1木盾1 Wooden Frame with 1 Bolts creates 1 Wooden Door.1木框架 + 1螺栓 = 1木门2 Nails creates 1 Caltrop.2钉子 = 1蒺藜2 Wire creates 1 Barbed Wire.2线 = 1铁丝网4 Wooden Spike creates 1 Wooden Spike Trap.4木穗 = 1木制钉陷阱1 Can with 2 Scrap Metal creates 1 Snare.1废罐头 + 2废金属 = 1诱饵陷阱3 Scrap Metal with 2 Wire creates 1 Electric Trap.3废金属 + 2线 = 1电子陷阱7 Cloth with 2 Duct Tape creates 1 Sleeping Bag.7布 + 2牛皮胶带 = 1睡袋8 Cloth with 5 Scrap Metal creates 1 Cot.8布 + 5废金属 = 1帆布床4 Stick with 4 Stone creates 1 Campfire.4木棒 + 4石头 = 1篝火1 Wooden Door with 1 Bolts creates 1 Wooden Shutter.1木门 + 1螺栓 = 1木百叶窗1 Wooden Shutter with 3 Scrap Metal creates 1 Metal Shutter.1木窗 + 3废金属 = 1金属百叶窗 3 Raw Explosives with 2 Duct Tape creates 1 MOAB (requires level 2 Craftsman).3爆裂物 + 2胶带 = 1摩押(需要2级工匠)2 Raw Explosives with 4 Wire creates 1 Tripmine (requires level 2 Craftsman).3爆裂物 + 4线 = 1激光绊雷(需要2级工匠)2 Raw Explosives with 1 Can creates 1 Landmine (requires level 2 Craftsman).2爆裂物 + 1废罐头 = 1地雷(需要2级工匠)4 Scrap Metal with 2 Bolts creates 1 Metal Shield (requires level 2 Craftsman).4废金属 + 2螺栓 = 1金属盾(需要2级工匠)1 Wooden Door with 3 Scrap Metal creates 1 Metal Door. (requires level 2 Craftsman).1木门 + 3废金属 = 1金属门(需要2级工匠)2 Sticks with 2 Bolts creates 1 Brazier2木棒 + 2螺栓 = 1火盆3 Barbed Wire with 2 Wooden Support creates 1 Wire Fence.3铁丝网 + 2木支架 = 1金属栅栏1 Wire Fence with 4 Scrap Metal creates 1 Electric Fence.1金属栅栏 + 4废金属 = 1导电栅栏
储藏
2 Wooden Frame with 3 Wooden Cross creates 1 Crate (requires level 1 Craftsman).2木框架 + 3木十字 = 1箱子(需要1级工匠)1 Crate with 3 Scrap metal creates 1 Metal Locker (requires level 2 Craftsman).1箱子 + 3废金属 = 1金属柜(需要2级工匠)1 Crate with 3 Wooden Cross creates 1 Chest (requires level 2 Craftsman).1箱子 + 3木十字 = 1大箱子(需要2级工匠)
构造
3 Wooden Frame creates 1 Wooden Foundation.3木框架 = 1木地基2 Wooden Frame with 1 Wooden Pillar creates 1 Wooden Wall.2木框架 + 1木支柱 = 1木墙1 Wooden Wall with 1 Wooden Support creates 1 Wooden Doorway.1木墙 + 1木支架 = 1木门2 Wooden Support with 1 Board creates 1 Wooden Pillar.2木支架 + 1木板 = 1木支柱3 Wooden Plate with 1 Wooden Cross creates 1 Wooden Platform.3木制板 + 1木十字 = 1木平台1 Wooden Platform with 2 Wooden Support creates 1 Wooden Ramp.1木平台 + 2木支柱 = 1木制斜坡1 Wooden Foundation with 4 Fertilizer creates 1 Greenhouse Foundation.1木地基 + 4化肥 = 1温室地基1 Wooden Platform with 4 Fertilizer creates 1 Greenhouse Platform.1木平台 + 4化肥 = 1温室平台1 Wooden Platform with 1 Wooden Frame creates 1 Wooden Hole.1木平台 + 1木框架 = 1木洞12 Stick with 1 Duct Tape creates 1 Wooden Ladder.12木棒 + 1木支架 = 1木百叶窗1 Wooden Doorway with 1 Wooden Support creates 1 Wooden Window.1木门 + 1木支架 = 1木窗1 Wooden Pillar creates 2 Wooden Post.1木支柱 = 2木桩1 Wooden Wall creates 2 Wooden Rampart.1木墙 = 2木堡垒1 Stone Wall creates 2 Stone Rampart (requires level 1 Craftsman).1石墙 = 2石堡垒(需要1级工匠)1 Stone Pillar creates 2 Stone Post (requires level 1 Craftsman).1石支柱 = 2石桩(需要1级工匠)2 Stone Frame with 2 Stone Pillar creates 1 Stone Wall (requires level 1 Craftsman).2石框架 + 2石支柱 = 1石墙(需要1级工匠)1 Stone Wall with 1 Stone Support creates 1 Stone Doorway (requires level 1 Craftsman).1石墙 + 1石支架 = 1石门(需要1级工匠)1 Stone Doorway with 1 Stone Support creates 1 Stone Window (requires level 1 Craftsman).1石门 + 1石支架 = 1石窗(需要1级工匠)2 Stone Support with 1 Board creates 1 Stone Pillar (requires level 1 Craftsman).2石支架 + 1石板 = 1石支柱(需要1级工匠)1 Wooden Window with 1 Wooden Support creates 1 Garage Port.1木窗 + 1木支架 = 1车库端口2 Wooden Shutter with 2 Bolts creates 1 Garage Door.2木百叶窗 + 2螺栓 = 1车库门2 Metal Shutter with 2 Bolts creates 1 Metal Garage Door.2金属窗 + 2螺栓 = 1金属车库门
衣服
4 Animal Pelt creates 1 Animal Shirt.4动物毛皮 = 1动物衬衫3 Animal Pelt with 1 Rope creates 1 Animal Pants.3动物毛皮 + 1绳子 = 1裤子4 Animal Pelt with 1 Duct Tape creates 1 Animalpack.4动物毛皮 + 1牛皮胶带 = 1动物毛皮背包1 Fancy Suit creates 2 Cloth.1 RCMP Uniform creates 2 Cloth.1 Police Uniform creates 2 Cloth.1 Army Fatigues creates 2 Cloth.1 Army Fatigues creates 2 Cloth.1 Doctor Coat creates 2 Cloth.1 Orange Hoodie creates 2 Cloth.1 Boring Suit creates 2 Cloth.1 Jumper Top creates 2 Cloth.1 Grocer Top creates 2 Cloth.1 Sailor Fatigues creates 1 Cloth.1 Plaid Shirt creates 2 Cloth.1 Chef Shirt creates 2 Cloth.1 Fancy Jeans creates 2 Cloth.1 RCMP Uniform creates 2 Cloth.1 Police Uniform creates 2 Cloth.1 Army Fatigues creates 2 Cloth.1 Army Fatigues creates 2 Cloth.1 Work Jeans creates 2 Cloth.1 Doctor Pants creates 2 Cloth.1 Grey Pants creates 2 Cloth.1 Boring Pants creates 2 Cloth.1 Jumper Bottom creates 2 Cloth.1 Grocer Bottom creates 2 Cloth.1 Lumberjack Pants creates 2 Cloth.1 Chef Pants creates 2 Cloth.1 Pink Shirt creates 1 Cloth.1 Brown Pants creates 1 Cloth.1 Khaki Pants creates 1 Cloth.1 Blue Sweatervest creates 1 Cloth.(某件衣服) = 1布 或者 2布
药物
2 Cloth creates 1 Rag.2布 = 1绷带1 Scrap Metal with 2 Stick creates 1 Splint.1废金属 + 2木棒 = 1夹板2 Red Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Red Berries.2红色浆果 + (岩石) = 1压碎的红色浆果2 Blue Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Blue Berries.2蓝色浆果 + (岩石) = 1压碎的蓝色浆果2 Pink Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Pink Berries.2粉色浆果 + (岩石) = 1压碎的粉色浆果2 Pale Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Pale Berries.2白色浆果 + (岩石) = 1压碎的白色浆果2 Green Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Green Berries.2绿色浆果 + (岩石) = 1压碎的绿色浆果2 Purple Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Purple Berries.2紫色浆果 + (岩石) = 1压碎的紫色浆果
食物
1 Raw Venison over a fire creates 1 Cooked Venison.1生鹿肉 + (火) = 1熟鹿肉1 Raw Bacon over a fire creates 1 Cooked Bacon.1生肉 + (火) = 1熟肉
饮料
1 Moldy Bottled Water with 1 Purification Tablets creates 1 Bottled Water.1发霉的瓶装水 + 1净化药片 = 1瓶装水1 Moldy Milk with 1 Purification Tablets creates 1 Milk.1发霉的牛奶 + 1净化药片 = 1牛奶1 Moldy Orange Juice with 1 Purification Tablets creates 1 Orange Juice.1发霉的橙汁 + 1净化药片 = 1橙汁
农业
1 Rope + 1 Cloth creates 3 Fertilizer.1绳子 + 1布 = 3化肥1 Fresh Carrot creates 2 Carrot Seed.1新鲜胡萝卜 = 2胡萝卜种子1 Moldy Carrot creates 1 Carrot Seed.1发霉胡萝卜 = 1胡萝卜种子1 Fresh Tomato creates 2 Tomato Seed.1新鲜番茄 = 2番茄种子1 Moldy Tomato creates 1 Tomato Seed.1新鲜番茄 = 1番茄种子1 Fresh Corn creates 2 Corn Seed.1新鲜玉米 = 2玉米种子1 Moldy Corn creates 1 Corn Seed.1发霉玉米 = 1玉米种子1 Fresh Cabbage creates 2 Cabbage Seed.1新鲜卷心菜 = 2卷心菜种子1 Moldy Cabbage creates 1 Cabbage Seed.1发霉卷心菜 = 1卷心菜种子1 Fresh Potato creates 2 Potato Seed.1新鲜土豆 = 2土豆种子1 Moldy Potato creates 1 Potato Seed.1发霉土豆 = 1土豆种子
弹药
2 Military Bullets with 1 NATO Magazine creates 1 NATO Magazine.2军用子弹 + 1NATO Magazine子弹夹 = 1满的NATO Magazine子弹夹4 Military Bullets with 1 NATO Drum creates 1 NATO Drum.2军用子弹 + 1NATO Drum子弹夹 = 1满的NATO Drum子弹夹1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Swift Magazine creates 1 Swift Magazine.1民用子弹 + 1Swift Magazine子弹夹 = 1满的Swift Magazine子弹夹1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Bonjour Clip creates 1 Bonjour Clip.1民用子弹 + 1Bonjour Clip子弹夹 = 1满的Bonjour Clip子弹夹1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Lebel Magazine creates 1 Lebel Magazine.1民用子弹 + 1Bonjour Clip子弹夹 = 1满的Bonjour Clip子弹夹2 Tracer Bullets with 1 NATO Tracer creates 1 NATO Tracer.2曳光弹 + 1NATO Tracer子弹夹 = 1满的NATO Tracer子弹夹2 Civilian Bullets with 1 Savage Magazine creates 1 Savage Magazine.2民用子弹 + 1Savage Magazine子弹夹 = 1满的Savage Magazine子弹夹4 Civilian Bullets with 1 Savage Drum creates 1 Savage Drum.4民用子弹 + 1Savage Drum子弹夹 = 1满的Savage Drum子弹夹1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Winchester Clip creates 1 Winchester Clip.1民用子弹 + 1Winchester Clip子弹夹 = 1满的Winchester Clip子弹夹1 Military Bullets with 1 Lapua Magazine creates 1 Lapua Magazine.1军用子弹 + 1Lapua Magazine子弹夹 = 1满的Lapua Magazine子弹夹1 Tracer Bullets with 1 Lapua Tracer creates 1 Lapua Tracer.1曳光弹 + 1Lapua Tracer子弹夹 = 1满的Lapua Tracer子弹夹2 Civilian Bullets with 1 Yuri Magazine creates 1 Yuri Magazine.2民用子弹 + 1Yuri Magazine子弹夹 = 1满的Yuri Magazine子弹夹1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Xtrmin Magazine creates 1 Xtrmin Magazine.1民用子弹 + 1Xtrmin Magazine子弹夹 = 1满的Xtrmin Magazine子弹夹1 Stick with 1 Nails creates 3 Arrow.1木棒 + 1钉子 = 3箭1 Shells with 2 Nails creates 6 Buckshot.1金属块 + 2钉子 = 6铅弹1 Shells with 2 Bolts creates 6 Slug.1金属块 + 2螺栓 = 6弹头
附加
1 Handlamp with 2 Duct Tape creates 1 Tactical Light.1手提灯 + 2牛皮胶带 = 1战术手提灯2 Canned Cola with 2 Can over a fire creates 1 Muffler.2罐装可乐 + 2废罐头 = 1消音器1 Binoculars with 2 Duct Tape creates 1 Zoomomatic.1望远镜 + 2牛皮胶带 = 1瞄准镜
装备
1 Batteries with 2 Scrap Metal creates 1 Handlamp.1电池 + 2废金属 = 1手提灯3 Wooden Support with 2 Rope creates 1 Longbow.3木支架 + 2绳子 = 1长弓1 Can with 1 Bottled Water creates 1 Canteen.1废罐头 + 1瓶装水 = 1水壶3 Nails with 1 Raw Explosives with level 2 crafting creates 1 Frag Grenade.3钉子 + 1爆裂物 = 1手榴弹1 Sledgehammer with 4 Scrap Metal creates 1 Car Jack.1王大锤 + 4废金属 = 1汽车千斤顶
合成列表出自网络贴吧
